pullRequest.title: heapReconfigured API changes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #8020
heapReconfigured API rework resulting from OMR changes eclipse/omr#4716
Signed-off-by: Salman Rana salman.rana@ibm.com

beforeCommit.message:

nodes.bodyText: Don't pass it here, since they don't use it. Hence don't touch the delegate classes.
